br.a: NOW ENROLLING FOR THE 2020/21 SCHOOL YEAR

div.p: Newman International Academy was established in 2010, offering PreK-12 education to students of diverse cultures. We emphasize a balanced, well-rounded education focusing on excellence, innovative learning, and discipline, striving to instill a passion for learning, and challenging students to become better and more equipped for their future.
Newman International Academy - "Helping good kids become great!"

NIA District Phone:
(682)207-5175
NIA District Fax:
(682)331-7096
Office Hours:
Monday - Friday
7:30am - 4:30pm
